titleStmt.title: [Carmen encomiasticum] or, An elogium consecreated to the right honourable Sir Robert Viner Lord Mayor of the most ancient and most flourishing emporium of the world the honourable city London for this prsent [sic] year, 1674.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

titleStmt.title: [Carmen encomiasticum] or, An elogium consecreated to the right honourable Sir Robert Viner Lord Mayor of the most ancient and most flourishing emporium of the world the honourable city London for this prsent [sic] year, 1674.
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

notesStmt.note: Imprint and portion of title suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Great wise, and pollitick, to you it is ..."
Imperfect: stained and folded, affecting title and text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
